highlightCode: import { Component, OnInit, ChangeDetectionStrategy } from '@angular/core'; interface UploadedFile { fileID: string; name: string; downloadURI: string; } @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-file-uploaded-basic', template: `<sc-file-uploaded [scUploadedFiles]="demoFiles" (scDeleteFileClicked)="deleteUploadedFile($event)"></sc-file-uploaded>`, changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush }) export class NzDemoFileUploadedBasicComponent implements OnInit { demoFiles: UploadedFile[] = [ { fileID: 'ID 1', name: 'Attachment 1', downloadURI: 'https://images.theconversation.com/files/350851/original/file-20200803-22-dfm95n.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=0%2C0%2C5760%2C3837&q=20&auto=format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip' }, { fileID: 'ID 2', name: 'Attachment 2 bad link', downloadURI: 'abc' }, { fileID: 'ID 3', name: 'Bongos', downloadURI: 'https://images.theconversation.com/files/350851/original/file-20200803-22-dfm95n.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=0%2C0%2C5760%2C3837&q=20&auto=format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip' }, ]; constructor() { } deleteUploadedFile(id: string) { console.log("DELETE WAS SELECTED ON", id); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
